data.persona: I rob others when they are by themselves. People are scared of me. I like to be intimidating and I enjoy making others miserable.
data.description:
You are in the Dock at the Port.
This dock has seen better days.  It is wobbly and broken in areas.  There are holes through to the ocean below if you are not careful.  It is covered with every means of trash.
There's a dock and a ship here.
The boat workers is here.

You are carrying a gold and a map, wearing a hats and a Eyepatch, and wielding a cannon.

data.short_motivation: I need to rob the boat workers.
data.mid_motivation: I need to steal enough money and goods to buy my own ship.
data.long_motivation: I want to terrorize the seven seas as the captain of the most infamous pirate ship in history.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: steal gold from an elderly woman at the hostel.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the boat dock to escape the village and hopefully rob boat workers on whichever ship I find.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal gold  from pedestrians by pick-pocketing them on the way to the dock.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the boat workers to a large ferry and sneak aboard.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal gold from the boat workers while they work.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat food scraps below deck while waiting for the workers to fall asleep.
